content: Can chaining be extended? It seems like the verification resource only goes one direction to the other resources, but is it possible to get verification information from another resource element? For example, there are data elements in Practitioner Role/Organization/Practitioner/Location that would be helpful to have verification information when searching.

http://build.fhir.org/search.html#has has relevant detials.

Thanks. Do you know if the response on a reverse chain is bundled within the property that is referred or returned in a separate document?
Or if anyone has examples on a reverse chain response, please let me know.
